title: A Regency Christmas II
description: This warm and delightful collection brings together five all-new stories of Christmas by some of the most beloved and highly acclaimed Regency authors. Written especially for the new edition, these delightful tales capture the spirit of Christmas ritual and tradition, its hopes and heartbreaks, its joys and passions. These are stories that reflect happy reunions and homecomings, the fun and festivities, the pleasures of giving, and, of course, the love and goodwill that make life so special and comprise the true message of the holiday season. Here is a beautiful gift that touches the heart -- a gift to be cherished now and all year 'round.Contains:“Sunshine for Christmas” by Mary Jo Putney“The Last Wish” by Anita Mills“Playing House” by Mary Balogh“The Three Kings” by Carla Kelly“The Christmas Star” by Sheila Walsh
author: Mary Balogh
